destinations.name: The Corvallis Advocate Loft
destinations.description: Come play. Featured this month is Foundry, an interactive, modular sculpture sandbox system designed to function in both practical and abstract fashion, facilitating users as both a tool and a playground. Paintings this month by Johnny Beaver, Jeremy Smith and Cyrus Peery.

destinations.name: Art in the Valley
destinations.description: Art in the Valley will feature a membership exhibit , "Primary Impressions".  Refreshments will be provided. Come celebrate 2016!

destinations.name: ArtWorks (CEI) Gallery
destinations.description:
A survey/exhibit of artworks by artists participating in the first year of ArtWorks (CEI) programs
 
And the launch of our INDIEGOGO fundraising campaign to purchase a hand built/custom designed “Coffee Pour Over Cart”. *Money raised through the sale of coffee will be used to fund the ArtWorks scholarship fund.

destinations.name: Azure Fine Art Gallery
destinations.summary: Nothing so shocking as bowling balls flocking.  Don’t miss Jeremy Smith’s life size pendulum which will be in motion during the CAW along with his other unique geometric constructions and puzzles including his cube of chess.  If you miss the pendulum in motion you can catch it again with continuing demonstrations on Saturdays during the installation.

destinations.name: Kaleidoscope Studios
destinations.description: The spiral has held significant but diverse meanings for cultures throughout time and from all over the world.   As we begin a new year, the spiral will be our artistic focus. Our featured artist is Jillian Jordan of Spiral Designs.  As always, there will be munchies, the building-wide art drawing, and glorious color in 3-D.  Hot tea or cocoa and a special spiral bead project too!

destinations.name: Cyrano's
destinations.description: CYRNAO'S Book binding, starting the New Year Small! Mini Book, Mini Art Journals, Mini Scrolls. Good things, small sizes.  Marbling Demo, come play!

destinations.name: Brittney West
destinations.summary: Come see thought-provoking activist art, browse through older work and Eco-Prints for sale--perfect for unique holiday gifts!
destinations.description: Come view over a decade of Brittney West's oil paintings and mixed-media drawings as well as view her recent activist artwork, exhibiting thought-provoking imagery intended to create a more compassionate coexistence. Enjoy snacks and wine in her ambient studio, pick at the artist's brain, snoop around and browse through her affordable Eco-Prints.

destinations.name: Studio262
destinations.description: New exhibit "The Art of Love" along with an interactive note writing station to share those messages of peace, love, hope, and and joy for the New Year. All happening in the redesigned gallery. Come see what's new!

destinations.name: Studio Beatrice
destinations.description: Carrie Tasman will feature her Colorful Paintings. Spindrift Cellars wine tasting, as well as other refreshments will be available.  Marshall Adams will surprise us w/music.

destinations.name: Majestic Theatre
destinations.description: A community art show exploring works of Mixed Media and Collage by local artists.

destinations.name: Fairbanks Art Gallery
destinations.description: VČELA: Blood & Honey draws from the forests of the Willamette valley and Central Europe as well as village folklore and ecological concern. With elements of sculpture, installation and poetry/performance, Goodworth’s installation connects to place, memory, object and land. The exhibit is the result of his research and art practice exploring the questions: ‘What is art’s role in helping one feel physically connected to land?’ And, ‘How can aesthetics witness to crises that arise in the natural world?’

destinations.name: Jeff Hess Studio
destinations.description: Welcoming the new year in with at least one new sculpture and a hanging of images from "aikya" (a perspective study of Yoga). Art Gods willing I plan to welcome the new year in with at least one new sculpture and some favorite 2D images.

destinations.name: Pegasus & Old World Deli
destinations.description: During the month of January Pegasus Gallery will strip down to the starker more temporal imagery of winter with a collection of hand made paper, sumi ink and stitch work by South Korean artist Chang Ae Song.

destinations.name: Rachel Urista / Laurel Thompson
destinations.summary: With the New Year comes fresh new work from the artists. See NEW coloring book illustrations and paintings on display.

destinations.name: The Arts Center
destinations.description: The Arts Center hosts a reception for ROT, the Afterlife of Trees. The exhibit shows work by 24 Oregon artists in a wide variety of media, as photography, painting, sculpture, ceramics and embroidery. The artists based their work on long term tree-decomposition research by Dr. Mark Harmon (OSU) at the H.J. Andrews Forest.

destinations.name: Corvallis Swing
destinations.summary: Swing dancing at Old World Deli
destinations.description:
We will be dancing on stage at the Old World Deli as part of the monthly Corvallis Arts Walk!! 

Our time will be short but sweet. Let's dance and celebrate together!!

destinations.name: Karen Wysopal Studio
destinations.description: Santa brought me a HUGE roll of yupo paper: 5 feet by 30 feet long!  Come see what happens as I continue to scale LARGE.  With the holidays behind us, treat yourself to some new art!  Lots of prints, cards, and original artwork for sale.
